alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Burnet; Hays (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 5:56PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Hays, west central Travis, northeastern Blanco and south central Burnet Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 556 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Spicewood, or 10 miles southeast of Marble Falls, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lago Vista, Pedernales Falls State Park, Spicewood, Cypress Mill and Briarcliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
